projects.title: Talking Face Generator
projects.description: A generative AI system that creates realistic talking face animations from audio input using advanced 3D modeling and diffusion techniques.

projects.title: Capacity Planning for Healthcare
projects.description: Nursing Staff forecasting for a big Hospital. Planning of staff required per department per shift.

projects.title: Generative AI Chatbot for NEMT
projects.description: An Gen AI based chatbot to automate the process of information gathering and booking/canceling rides for the customer base.

projects.title: Generative AI Accelerator For Real Estate
projects.description: A virtual real estate agent, that allows users, experience real estate in VR along with Gen AI powered property search.

projects.title: Healthcare Transportation Accelerator
projects.description: Classical ML based classification problem for Ambulance Show/No Show. A what if analysis tool for revenue projections by reducing No-show costs.

projects.title: Real time Automated Workspace Analytics
projects.description: A CV based system for workspace analytics, including object detection and tracking, with Kubernetes-based autoscaling and interactive dashboards for key performance metrics.

projects.title: QA for Pharmaceutical (Whitepaper)
projects.description:
Researched and developed a proof of concept for a clinical QA system using PubMedBERT and ClinicaBERT, focusing on question
classification, information retrieval, and answer generation with state-of-the-art transformer techniques.

projects.title: AI Based Call Center Agent Performance Monitoring
projects.description:
Implemented an Azure-powered speech-to-text solution with voice activity detection, speech enhancement, and text classification for generating
agent and client transcriptions.

projects.title: Traffic & Audience Analytics
projects.description:
Built a real-time computer vision platform for traffic and audience analytics, including object detection, traffic violation monitoring, lane
detection, footfall counting, and age-gender analytics, integrated with a Java-based web portal (for traffic and retail audience surveillance).
